lacks reasoning capability: number of layers is only one

lacks reasoning capability.from sentence: When the number of layers is only one, the model lacks reasoning capability.

hurts.from sentence: Including vector gates hurts in 1k datasets, as the model either overfits to the training data or converges to local minima.

sometimes help.from sentence: On the other hand, vector gates in bAbI story-based QA 10k dataset sometimes help.
